ack.p: We wish to thank Moon-Woo Seong (Seoul National University College of Medicine) for sharing SARS coronavirus Frankfurt1 RNA (SARS RNA) and in vitro transcribed RNA of SARS-CoV-2 region E ( E tRNA) supplied by European Virus Archive-Global ( https://www.european-virus-archive.com/). We would like to thank Editage ( www.editage.com) for English language editing.
